comments.content: I was wondering if anyone has links to a Etsy or company that makes a box insert or something to help organize this epic size game.  I have been playing since it was first released and the amount of cards is becoming overwhelming to sort and separate.  I would honestly play more if I had some better way to find the scenarios cards

Check this guy out:

https://www.etsy.com/shop/Customisedgaming [https://www.etsy.com/shop/Customisedgaming]

He has lots of options and comes highly recommended.
